channel.title: Your favorite memory of moparcraft?
channel.description:
its been a while since i have been on this server (never has it let me down), and I have found myself thinking about it quite a lot recently (all the things i enjoyed), so i have a question to all of the people who play on this server out there what is/was your favorite memory of moparcraft?
mine is starting out, and making my small cave under my brothers house :D.

item.title: Your favorite memory of moparcraft?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:31, topic:431709”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=534413.msg3911037#msg3911037 date=1328741858]
Was so much fun…

We need tons of mature people on again, will be such a blast…
[/quote]FIX’T[/quote]
Well more people = more action one way or another

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite memory of moparcraft?
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

Varrock and the fact that i found my first diamonds 2 minutes after krack logged on, and agl letting me live in his house, and corey saying my house was ugly and in the way for future expansion. Haven and the big raid that pissed all havenfags off (yes i know…) shitting brix when seeing viz’s place and after the update to 1.4(?) lagging like hell when in there. mitb griefing varrock when server got vanilla for update. living in agl’s old house when he didn’t know about it, david worldediting that house away when new spawn came. i code rsps griefing akatsuki, my hotel in haven getting griefed every fucking day. helping agl fix the pond at akatsuki diving board on hotel.making a swastika on ice, my chests vanished with that seed bug david wrote a plugin for to fix it while it was fixed in the latest bukkit build.

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite memory of moparcraft?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Henrybone:

Well, I’m a kind of new member, but I can’t play anymore because I have 1.1, but I’d say that when I tried to make a Slime spawn, I got about seventeen diamonds out of it.

Downgrade here: http://www.moparcraft.net/smf/index.php/topic,524930.0.html

text

Remember in the next world when someone came in and killed all of our dogs -.-

Lol in the underground safehouse?!

Good times

Remember I was testing that incinerator and I thought the dog couldnt fall in, then it fell in and got incinerated loael

But it was that other guy that was with us for a while, it was his dog
[/quote]

Mongolianbeef? I liked him…[/quote]
me too

Too bad we burned his dog in lava loael

Cole1497:

before we even had moparcraft.net

+1

item.title: Your favorite memory of moparcraft?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

The VIP award was epic. But it was based more on activity and being supportive, not how well you could build. Like that one guy… steam? I don’t remember exactly. But he was always active and helpful so I gave it to him I liked the colors too… we had a lot of fun discussing and changing them XD

I think overall, my favorite memory would be working together to build MITB’s epic mountain house.

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite memory of moparcraft?
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

when niffle tortured me, chullx3, manbearpig, foxehoscar, and copcar556 lol. then he told me he was going to have me banned because he logged out and i put lava where he logged.

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite memory of moparcraft?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Starting and running the town Coligo. Dug a tunnel system over to pine town which we made into a rail system to spawn. Had fun having 8 active town members at one point. The town was coming along fine but eventually died off like any other town does. We had a lack of space and people willing to help expand.

Read full topic

item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

i only remember building my first house from scratch in coligo :3

item.title: Your favorite memory of moparcraft?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

I miss following random people around because I didn’t know jack shit about anything, trying to learn whatever i could.

Then I remember following Cole, kracky, and I think vain/noobs are ftw around, then cole died, and he was next to me so I got his diamond axe/sword and thought “oo” but then b4 i knew it I was dead.

I remember Haven, and before I joined it I replaced the sign that said haven with “DONT JOIN THIS PLACE ITS GAY -MOARISTHEBEST” then joining the next day, seeing all the fights with akatsuki, the vip titles, and I didn’t know what to do so I would cower underground seeing if I could find some goods, thinking redstone was good, shitting when I saw lava, and the first time I saw diamond… I shit 9000 bricks, soon I had entire 8 diamonds!! Then I Code Rsps scammed/lured w/e u want to call it my shit, but its not against the rules so… yeah
Then when I saw that all of Moparcraft was under dictator ship of Akatsuki, and finding their underground tunnel, I just went as far away as I could, I don’t honestly remember the coords, maybe 10000s or something? Anyways, I was safe from any possible trespasser there, including Akatsuki, they cbf to go there

It was a huge valley, surrounded by mountains, I named it Entrana, lit up the entire valley, and it stayed natural :3
Good times…

Read full topic

item.title: Your favorite memory of moparcraft?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Tom_BETA:

I remember stealing si forces floor then re adding it, and repeating the process everytime he logged in/our. This was way before any bukkit/hey0 stuff came in so people could just do whatever they wanted. I wasn’t really griefing because I was readding it.

I logged in a few times to find that floor missing… plots revenge

I think my favorite memory was the first time I played the server back in the original world. I hadn’t a clue how to play Minecraft and kept getting lost, and a creeper blew up my dirt shack refuge. It was a sad but memorable day.

Read full topic
